content: this little piggy is around 29cm she was made with alize diva yarn but she can be made with any yarn you prefer i was using a hook size 3 5mm i used light pink dark pink red white and black yarn she is easy and fun to make and she is awesome for cuddling the pattern is easy to follow with a lot of instructions skill level - medium skills required magic_ring single_crochet increase decrease chain slip_stitch half_double_crochet half color changes also basic sewing and embroidery techniques
